analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Pītisahagataṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca napītisahagato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā aṭṭhavīsa …pe… avigate aṭṭhavīsa.
analyzed: pīti sahagatam hetum dhammam paṭicca na pīti sahagataḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā aṭṭhavīsa pe avigate aṭṭhavīsa

original: Pītisahagataṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa …pe… avigate aṭṭhārasa.
analyzed: pīti sahagatam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na upekkhā sahagataḥ na na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā aṭṭhārasa pe avigate aṭṭhārasa
